item.name: Zandalar Illusionist's Robe
item.htmlTooltip:
Zandalar Illusionist's Robe
Item Level 65
Binds when picked up
ChestCloth
100 Armor
+24 Intellect
+23 Stamina
Durability 100 / 100
Classes: Mage
Equip: Improves your chance to hit with spells by 1%.
Equip: Increases damage and healing done by magical spells and effects by up to 27.

Illusionist's Attire (0/5)
Jewel of Kajaro
Hazza'rah's Charm of Magic
Zandalar Illusionist's Wraps
Zandalar Illusionist's Mantle
Zandalar Illusionist's Robe

(2) Set : Increases damage and healing done by magical spells and effects by up to 12.
(3) Set : Decreases the mana cost of Arcane Intellect and Arcane Brilliance by 5%.
(5) Set : Reduces the casting time of your Flamestrike spell by 0.5 sec.
